### R and RStudio

Please make you sure you have the latest versions of R and RStudio (see the [introduction](../introduction) page
for details).

### Additional packages

This course uses a few other packages. Run the following lines of code to 
install them.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("drat")
drat::addRepo("jr-packages")
install.packages("jrModelling", dependencies = TRUE)
```

The command

```{r, message=FALSE}
library("jrModelling")
```
should run in the console window.
